MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to install generators then disconnect the generator and connect customers back on to the network this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5pm on Wednesday 24th March 2021.
